page.title: 20TRANSPORT_ SUTTON BONINGTON
page.content:
{Buses }North 14 South 14 {Cars }North 370 South 371 {Vans }North 55 South 50 {Lorries }North 8 South 13 {Motor Bikes}North 17 South 16 {Bicycles }North 111 South 95
1134{vehicles}passed the school on June 18th.from 8.30-15.30. The busiest times were 8.30-9.00 and 12.30-13.00. Because the{bus stops}on the opposite side of the road we are allowed a lollipop lady in the mornings.
{T.Goodwin,A.Roulstone,J.Baker,S.Davey, {C.Fairclough,H.Greensmith,T.James,E.Pa {ge,R.Birkett,R.Dingle,J.Shipley,L.Burg {ess,A.Colls,S.Dade,C.McCarthy,L.Stodda {rt,D.Brooks,J.Brooks,R.Berridge,S.Camp {bell,A.Downend,S.Gibb,M.Harrod,M.Foxcr {oft,D.Hurst,K.Kerwin,J.Whalley,} Sutton Bonington Junior School.
